Article Title: Google I/O 2024: Android is getting features to protect phones when they are stolen
Article Text:
Improved device and data protection to deter theft before it happens

Security features to strengthen Android device's security against theft:

Factory reset upgrade prevents a reset by a thief:

Private space to hide sensitive apps:

More steps for changing sensitive device settings:

Enhanced authentication in case the PIN is known by a thief:

Automatic protection when the phone is stolen

Automatic AI-powered screen lock:

Offline Device Lock for added protection:

Automatic locking of Android device after they are stolen

With Remote Lock feature

Google I/O 2024 , the company’s annual developers conference, is underway. On the second day of the event, Google announced several features for Android smartphones, including a new suite of advanced theft protection features that it claims will protect users’ data before, during and after their phone is stolen.Google is bringing a bunch of new features and enhancing some older ones to strengthen an Android device's security against theft.It says that the new and improved protection features “will make thieves think twice about trying.”Usually, when a phone is stolen, thieves quickly reset the device and resell it. Android phones will now be difficult to factory reset with an upgrade to Android’s factory reset protection. If your phone is stolen, thieves won’t be able to factory reset it as it will require device or Google account credentials – rendering the stolen device unsellable.In case a thief gets access to your phone, they may want to extract valuable data and transfer funds from your phone that can be worth much more than the phone itself. Android will now have a ‘Private’ space – a separate area in the phone that can hide and lock with a separate PIN, giving users additional security for apps that may contain sensitive data, like health or financial information.Android phones will now require PIN, password or biometric authentication to disable Find My Device or extend screen timeout, essentially adding an extra layer of security.When enabled, the new enhanced authentication will require biometrics for accessing and changing critical Google account and device settings, like changing your PIN, disabling theft protection or accessing Passkeys, from an untrusted location.Factory reset protection updates and private space will be released as part of Android 15 while enhanced authentication protections will be released to select devices later this year.In case your phone is stolen, Android will soon automatically recognise suspicious signals and proactively protect the data on the device.When your Android phone is snatched, the Theft Detection Lock feature will use Google AI to sense it by detecting common motion associated with theft and quickly locks the screen.If a thief tries to disconnect a stolen Android phone for prolonged periods of time, Offline Device Lock automatically locks the screen to help protect your data even when the device is off the grid. It will also lock the device screen when excessive failed authentication attempts are made.Theft Detection Lock and Offline Device Lock will be available to Android 10+ devices through a Google Play services update later this year.Third is an upgrade to the Find My Device feature that allows users to remotely lock or wipe a lost or stolen phone and mark it as lost for easier tracking., users will be able to lock the screen of their phones with just their phone numbers and a quick security challenge using any device, essentially buying you the time to recover account details and perform full factory reset.
Article Summary: Google I/O 2024, the company’s annual developers conference, is underway. Google announced a new suite of advanced theft protection features that it claims will protect users’ data before, during and after their phone is stolen. Android will now have a ‘Private’ space – a separate area in the phone that can hide and lock with a separate PIN.

Article Title: 7 key numbers Google CEO Sundar Pichai mentioned on stage during Google I/O 2024 keynote
Article Text:
Gemini 1.5 Pro and 1 million tokens

All Google products with over 2 billion users use Gemini

Over 6 billion

photos

and

videos

uploaded everyday

Support for long context queries

Google announces 6th generation TPUs

Google’s liquid cooling system capacity is growing

The number of times Google said “AI” during the presentation

Google's annual developer conference, Google I/O, kicked off today with a keynote address by CEO Sundar Pichai . As expected, AI was a prominent theme, with Pichai highlighting significant advancements in Google's Gemini AI models and the company's growing prowess in the field. Here's a deeper dive into some of the key numbers Pichai shared:Google introduced Gemini 1.5 Pro earlier this year allowing AI models to handle long context.It can run 1 million tokens in production, which it claims is more than any other large-scale foundation model yet.Pichai said that more than 1.5 million developers use Gemini models across the company's tools. He said that Gemini 1.5 Pro is available to all developers globally across 35 languages.“All of our 2-billion user products use Gemini,” Pichai said, adding that over 1 million people have signed up to try Gemini AI in just three months.While talking about Google Photos, Pichai said that the app – which was launched almost nine years ago – sees more than 6 billion photos and videos being uploaded every single day.While discussing multimodality in AI models, Pichai said that Gemini AI models have taken a step further in terms long context, enabling us to bring in even more information: hundreds of pages of text, hours of audio or an hour of video, entire code repos…or, if you want, roughly 96 Cheesecake Factory menus.The top executive announced the company’s 6th generation of TPUs, called Trillium. Trillium is said to be Google’s most performant and most efficient TPU to date, delivering a 4.7x improvement in compute performance per chip over the previous generation, TPU v5e.Pichai said that Google’s total deployed fleet capacity for liquid cooling systems is nearly 1 gigawatt and growing — that’s close to 70 times the capacity of any other fleet.“Underlying this is the sheer scale of our network, which connects our infrastructure globally. Our network spans more than 2 million miles of terrestrial and subsea fiber: over 10 times (!) the reach of the next leading cloud provider,” he added.Among various other jokes, there was a tongue in cheek moment on stage where Google seemed to take a dig at last year’s reports where publications counted how many times did Google executives use the word “AI” over the course of the presentation.Pichai said that Gemini has done the heavy lifting and counted it. All Google executives used “AI” terms over 120 times during the 110-minute presentation.
Article Summary: Google's annual developer conference, Google I/O, kicked off today. CEO Sundar Pichai highlighted significant advancements in Google's Gemini AI models and the company's growing prowess in the field. All Google executives used “AI” terms over 120 times during the 110-minute presentation. Google announced the company’s 6th generation of TPUs, called Trillium.

Article Title: Amazon, Flipkart, Google and Facebook agree on government's new rules for online shopping reviews: Here's what they say
Article Text: The consumer affairs department held a meeting with major e-commerce companies to discuss tackling the issue of fake reviews . Tht a meeting held here, representatives from Amazon, Flipkart, Google and Meta, among others, endorsed the proposed quality control order to implement the IS 19000:2022 standard on 'online consumer reviews', according to the department.This move comes after a voluntary system failed to significantly reduce fake reviews. Consumer complaints related to e-commerce surged from 95,270 in 2018 to a staggering 4,44,034 in 2023, highlighting the urgency of stricter regulations.The proposed Quality Control Order will enforce the existing IS 19000:2022 standard, which outlines guidelines for both reviewers and platforms. This standard aims to ensure transparency and prevent manipulation by requiring:* Identification of Reviewers: Anonymity for reviewers will be eliminated.* Unedited Reviews: Reviews cannot be altered after submission to prevent tampering with content.* Encouraging All Reviews: Platforms cannot suppress negative reviews.Consumer Affairs Secretary Nidhi Khare emphasized the importance of these standards, stating that online shoppers rely heavily on reviews, especially for products they cannot examine physically. Fake reviews erode trust in online platforms and lead to poor purchasing decisions. While consumer activist Pushpa Girimji, who attended the meeting, welcomed the initiative, she stressed the importance of enforcing these regulations effectively to truly combat the issue of fake reviews.The draft Quality Control Order will be open for public consultation before implementation. This signifies a significant step towards ensuring a more trustworthy online shopping experience for Indian consumers.
Article Summary: The consumer affairs department held a meeting with major e-commerce companies to discuss tackling the issue of fake reviews. Amazon, Flipkart, Google and Meta, among others, endorsed the proposed quality control order to implement the IS 19000:2022 standard on 'online consumer reviews'

Article Title: Netflix may be getting ready for another big push into live events this Christmas
Article Text:
Why NFL

Netflix will reportedly air two National Football League games this Christmas Day. According to a report by Bloomberg, streaming giant Netflix has secured a deal to air two National Football League games on Christmas Day this year, marking a significant push into live events for the company.The three-year agreement, as reported by Bloomberg, will also see Netflix host at least one Christmas Day game in both 2025 and 2026.Executives at Netflix like the idea of a Christmas Day event that could bring millions of viewers to the service all at once. No live event is a bigger draw for viewers or advertisers in the US than the NFL, which accounts for the majority of the most-watched live TV broadcasts in the country every year."There are no live annual events, sports or otherwise, that compare with the audiences NFL football attracts," said Bela Bajaria, Netflix's chief content officer, in a statement to Bloomberg. The agreement marks the first time Netflix has licensed the rights to one of the world’s premiere sports competitions and the first time it will show live football, the most popular sport in the US. The company will pay less than $150 million per game, according to people familiar with the deal who asked not to be identified because the terms are private. Both Netflix and the NFL declined to comment.This deal signifies a first for Netflix: it's the first time they've acquired rights to a major sports league and the first time they'll broadcast live football, the most popular sport in the US. The company will reportedly pay less than $150 million per game, according to sources familiar with the deal cited by Bloomberg.
Article Summary: Netflix has secured a deal to air two National Football League games on Christmas Day this year. The three-year agreement will also see Netflix host at least one Christmas Day game in both 2025 and 2026. The company will pay less than $150 million per game, according to people familiar with the deal.

Article Title: Apple’s new accessibility features brings eye-tracking, Music Haptics, and more
Article Text:
Eye Tracking for hands-free control on iPhone and iPad

Music Haptics and Vocal Shortcuts enhance accessibility

AI-powered features reduce motion sickness and improve Speech Recognition

visionOS and CarPlay receive accessibility upgrades

Apple has announced a bunch of new accessibility features for iPhone , iPad , and Vision Pro , which should help users with disabilities interact with their devices better. The new features, including Eye Tracking and Music Haptics , are expected to debut in iOS 18 and VisionOS later this year, harnessing the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to create a more inclusive user experience.The standout feature is Eye Tracking, which enables users with physical disabilities to navigate their iPhone or iPad using only their eyes. By using the front-facing camera and on-device machine learning, Eye Tracking allows users to select elements on the screen by simply holding their gaze, eliminating the need for touch input. It uses AI to recognize user gestures like swiping and tapping. Apple's Dwell Control feature is already available on Macs, sensing when someone's gaze pauses on an element. The setup process is quick, and it works with third-party apps integrated into the OS, like Assistive Touch.Apple also introduced Music Haptics, a feature designed for users who are deaf or hard of hearing. Using the iPhone's Taptic Engine, Music Haptics translates millions of songs on Apple Music into taps, textures, and vibrations, providing a new way to experience music. Additionally, Vocal Shortcuts allows users to assign custom phrases to launch shortcuts and perform complex tasks hands-free.Vehicle Motion Cues, another notable addition, aims to reduce motion sickness for passengers using their iPhone or iPad in a moving vehicle. By displaying animated dots on the screen's edges that mimic the vehicle's motion, the feature minimises sensory conflict. Furthermore, Listen for Atypical Speech uses machine learning to recognize unique speech patterns, benefiting users with conditions like cerebral palsy, ALS, or stroke.Apple's upcoming visionOS platform will include systemwide Live Captions, aiding users who are deaf or hard of hearing in following along with spoken dialogue. CarPlay will also gain accessibility features like Voice Control, Color Filters, and Sound Recognition, making it easier for users with disabilities to navigate and control apps while driving.
Article Summary: Apple announces new accessibility features for iPhone, iPad, and Vision Pro. Eye Tracking allows users with physical disabilities to navigate using only their eyes. Music Haptics translates millions of songs on Apple Music into taps, textures, and vibrations. Vocal Shortcuts lets users assign custom phrases to launch shortcuts and perform complex tasks hands-free.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: When Google’s Gemini got the camera tips wrong on stage
Article Text:
Search in the Gemini era | Google I/O 2024

Google is changing internet search as we know it, infusing it with AI and serving up all the information you need on top of the page so you don't have to scroll through the whole internet. Gone are the days when you'd have to type out what you wanted to know or even put a photo. Now, you can just show AI the things you need help with, and it'll have the answer for you.But what if it's not working as it should be, meaning giving the wrong answers, so bad that even a human knows, but AI doesn't?In a video showing " Search in the Gemini era ," Google showed its hot new feature, the video search. What does it do? Video search allows you to search by talking over a video clip.The example they used was a video of a film camera where the lever to advance the film was stuck. They asked Gemini: "Why is the lever not moving all the way." Gemini quickly listed solutions, including one that wasn’t right and would ruin the photos for sure.Google’s AI told the person to "Open the back door and gently remove the film if the camera is jammed." Doing that to a film camera would ruin all the photos by exposing the film to light.So far, Google has provided no comment on this matter.This isn’t the first time Google has run into issues with its AI on stage. Last year, at I/O, when it was showcasing the Bard (the former name of Gemini), the AI chatbot wrongly claimed that the James Webb Space Telescope took the first pictures of exoplanets when it was the European Very Large Telescope in 2004. This error cost Google about $100 billion, wiping out a huge chunk of its market valuation.Leave the text, but Google’s image AI isn’t that perfect, either. Earlier this year, Gemini also faced criticism for refusing to generate images of white people and producing historically inaccurate content like "Asian Nazis." Google apologised for this and had to pause the image-generating capabilities for a few weeks.
Article Summary: Video search allows you to search by talking over a video clip. Google’s AI told the person to "Open the back door and gently remove the film if the camera is jammed" This isn’t the first time Google has run into issues with its AI.

Article Title: Google accidentally 'deletes' $125 billion account holding pension funds from Cloud; CEO says sorry
Article Text:
Here's the joint statement:

UniSuper and Google Cloud understand the disruption to services experienced by members has been extremely frustrating and disappointing. We extend our sincere apologies to all members.

While supporting UniSuper to bring its systems back online, Google Cloud has been conducting a root cause analysis.

Google Cloud CEO, Thomas Kurian has confirmed that the disruption arose from an unprecedented sequence of events whereby an inadvertent misconfiguration during provisioning of UniSuper’s Private Cloud services ultimately resulted in the deletion of UniSuper’s Private Cloud subscription.

This is an isolated, ‘one-of-a-kind occurrence’ that has never before occurred with any of Google Cloud’s clients globally. This should not have happened. Google Cloud has identified the events that led to this disruption and taken measures to ensure this does not happen again.

Why did the outage last so long?

UniSuper had duplication in two geographies as a protection against outages and loss. However, when the deletion of UniSuper’s Private Cloud subscription occurred, it caused deletion across both of these geographies.

Restoring UniSuper’s Private Cloud instance has called for an incredible amount of focus, effort, and partnership between our teams to enable an extensive recovery of all the core systems. The dedication and collaboration between UniSuper and Google Cloud has led to an extensive recovery of our Private Cloud which includes hundreds of virtual machines, databases and applications.

UniSuper had backups in place with an additional service provider. These backups have minimised data loss, and significantly improved the ability of UniSuper and Google Cloud to complete the restoration.

What’s next?

UniSuper and Google Cloud have been working around the clock on a resolution. The completion of the restoration swiftly, safely and securely remains Google Cloud and UniSuper’s top priority.

Australian pension fund UniSuper members faced a week-long outage due to an accidental deletion of their private cloud account by Google Cloud . This impacted over half a million people who couldn't access their superannuation accounts.Service restoration began on Thursday, but it might take some time for investment balances to reflect current figures.UniSuper assured members they're working on a swift update.UniSuper CEO, Peter Chun, reached out to members via email on Wednesday. He clarified that the incident wasn't a cyberattack and there was no data breach. Chun pinpointed a Google Cloud configuration error as the culprit behind the outage.The outage reportedly lasted for an extended period of time as the subscription was deleted, taking with it UniSuper's two geographies that were intended to provide protection against outages and loss. Fortunately, UniSuper had backups in place with a different service provider. UniSuper is said to have moved a large amount of its workloads to Google Cloud Platform in 2023, having previously split them between Azure and two of its own data centers.In a rare move, UniSuper and Google Cloud issued a joint apology. In a joint statement with UniSuper CEO Peter Chun , Google CEO Thomas Kurian admitted that an "inadvertent misconfiguration" during the provisioning of UniSuper's Private Cloud services resulted in the deletion of the data.
Article Summary: Australian pension fund UniSuper members faced a week-long outage due to an accidental deletion of their private cloud account by Google Cloud. This impacted over half a million people who couldn't access their superannuation accounts. UniSuper CEO, Peter Chun, reached out to members via email on Wednesday. He clarified that the incident wasn't a cyberattack and there was no data breach.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: AI, Android 15 and possibly more Pixel phones
Article Text:
Google’s I/O keynote is going to be mostly about AI,

Gemini

, and even more AI

A sneak peek into

Android 15

More

Pixel phones

, maybe?

Expanding the Google ecosystem

What's in for the developers

Google's annual developer conference, Google I/O 2024 , will kick off on May 14 with a keynote address that promises to showcase the tech giant's latest advancements in artificial intelligence (AI), Android updates, and some new hardware.Building upon last year's AI-centric event, Google is expected to double down on its AI initiatives, focusing strongly on its Gemini platform.Gemini, Google's answer to OpenAI's ChatGPT , will likely take centre stage as the company demonstrates new features and capabilities that could further enhance the AI chatbot we know today.While AI steals the spotlight, Google won't forget its roots in mobile technology. Attendees can expect a deep dive into Android 15, the latest version of Google's mobile operating system. With the first Android 15 beta already in the hands of developers, Google is poised to unveil a host of new user-facing features designed to enhance productivity, privacy, and security. Android 15 promises to deliver a more polished and efficient mobile experience, from improved notification management to a more refined user interface.Although Google I/O is primarily a software-focused event, the company has been known to surprise audiences with hardware announcements in the past. This year, the Pixel 8a has already been unveiled ahead of the conference, but that doesn't mean Google is out of tricks. Whispers of a potential Pixel Fold 2 or even a teaser for the upcoming Pixel 9 series have been circulating, leaving tech enthusiasts eager to see what Google has up its sleeve.We might also see some new Nest hardware make it to the main stage. A new chromecast, possibly a ‘Pro’ one.In addition to the headline-grabbing announcements, Google I/O 2024 is expected to showcase updates and improvements across the company's vast ecosystem of products and services. From enhancements to Google Maps and Google Workspace to advancements in WearOS and smart home technology - we could hear about the new upgrades coming to them. But, at the end of the day, it’s going to be all about AI.The keynote is what most normal people focus on, but the I/O is a developer galore. Developers can look forward to a wealth of sessions, workshops, and resources designed to help them leverage the latest technologies and best practices in their projects. Whether it's harnessing the power of AI, optimising for Android 15, or integrating with Google's ever-expanding suite of tools, developers are in for new technologies to play with.With AI poised to take centre stage and Android 15 promising a new era of mobile innovation, Google seems ready to set the tone for the coming year at the I/O 2024.
Article Summary: Google's annual developer conference, Google I/O 2024, will kick off on May 14. The keynote address will showcase the tech giant's latest advancements in artificial intelligence (AI), Android updates, and some new hardware. Building upon last year's AI-centric event, Google is expected to double down on its Gemini platform.

Article Title: Buying a second-hand phone? Key factors to keep in mind before making a purchase
Article Text:
Buy second-hand phone: Key factors to consider before purchasing

Phone condition: Assess the physical condition of the phone. Look for scratches, dents, or other signs of wear. Check the screen for cracks and ensure all buttons and ports function correctly.

Age of the phone: Determine how old the phone is and consider its release date. Older models may lack software updates and compatibility with newer apps.

Battery health: Battery life is crucial for a smooth user experience. Inquire about the battery health and ask for details on its capacity and degradation over time.

Software updates: Ensure the phone is compatible with the latest software updates from the manufacturer. Older devices may not receive updates, which can impact security and functionality.

Network compatibility: Confirm that the phone is unlocked or compatible with your network carrier. Some phones are locked to specific carriers, limiting your options.

IMEI check: Verify the phone's IMEI number to ensure it's not stolen or blacklisted. This step helps prevent buying a phone with legal issues or unpaid bills.

Performance testing: Test the phone's performance by running apps, browsing the internet, and checking the camera quality. Look for lagging or freezing issues.

Storage capacity: Determine the phone's storage capacity and assess whether it meets your needs for storing photos, videos, and apps.

Price comparison: Research the market value of the phone model you're interested in. Compare prices from different sellers to ensure you're getting a fair deal.

Seller reputation: Buy from reputable sellers with positive reviews or ratings. Avoid transactions with unknown individuals or suspicious online platforms.

Also read

In today's rapidly evolving smartphone market, purchasing a second-hand phone has become an attractive option for consumers seeking cost-effective alternatives to brand-new devices. Whether you're looking to save money, obtain a discontinued model, or experiment with a different phone without breaking the bank, buying a pre-owned phone can be a practical choice.However, navigating the world of used smartphones requires careful consideration to ensure you're making a smart investment.Before finalising your decision to purchase a second-hand phone, it's essential to weigh several key factors that can influence your overall experience and satisfaction with the device. From assessing the phone's condition to evaluating its performance and compatibility, each factor plays a critical role in determining whether a used phone is the right choice for you.This comprehensive guide will explore the important factors to consider before buying a second-hand phone, empowering you to make an informed decision and find a reliable device that meets your needs and expectations.
Article Summary: Buying a pre-owned phone can be a practical choice. But navigating the world of used smartphones requires careful consideration. From assessing the phone's condition to evaluating its performance and compatibility, each factor plays a critical role in determining whether a used phone is the right choice for you.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 15 deal: How to buy it at Rs 42,900
Article Text:
How to buy Apple iPhone 15 for Rs 42,900



Apple iPhone 15 is up for grabs with exciting offers and discounts on India iStore. So much so that you can buy the device for as low as Rs 42,900 (base variant). India iStore is running an Upgrader Fest from May 10 to May 26 that offers exchange discounts and bank discounts on purchase of Apple iPhone 15 series. If you have been looking to upgrade your old iPhone to the latest iPhone, then now is the time.Apple iPhone 15 carries a price tag of Rs 79,900 for the 128GB variant. As part of the ongoing offer, India iStore is giving an instant store discount of Rs 5,000 which brings down the price to Rs 74,900. Additionally, there is an instant cashback of Rs 4,000 on credit cards of ICICI Bank and SBI.Further, there is a discount of Rs 20,000 if you exchange your old iPhone while purchasing the new iPhone 15. Do note that the said Rs 20,000 discount is calculated on exchange value of the 64GB model of iPhone 12. India iStore is also giving an exchange bonus of Rs 8,000.All these discounts cumulatively bring down the effective price of iPhone 15 to Rs 42,900.As mentioned above, the website is also giving discounts on other iPhone 15 series - iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max. You can purchase the iPhone 15 Plus at an effective price of Rs 52,900 during the fest. Apple iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max, on the other hand, can be purchased at an effective price of Rs 1,03,900 and Rs 1,28,900, respectively.In addition, there is an offer of up to Rs 14,000 on Apple iPhone 13.
Article Summary: Apple iPhone 15 carries a price tag of Rs 79,900 for the 128GB variant. India iStore is running an Upgrader Fest from May 10 to May 26. There is an instant cashback of Rs 4,000 on credit cards of ICICI Bank and SBI.

Article Title: 30 free Poki Games online you need to play right now; explore the list
Article Text:
Free Poki Games online to play anytime, anywhere

Subway Surfers

Gameplay instructions

Use the Arrow Up key to make Jake jump over obstacles.

Press Arrow Down to make Jake duck down and slide under barriers.

Use the left and right arrow keys to shift Jake's position sideways.

Activate the hoverboard by pressing the Space key, granting temporary immunity from collisions.

Aim to run for as long as possible while collecting coins and power-ups to achieve higher scores and unlock rewards.

Candy Crush Saga

Gameplay instructions

Click and hold on a candy using your mouse or trackpad cursor.

Drag the candy in any direction (up, down, left, or right) to swap it with an adjacent candy.

Aim to create matches of three or more candies of the same color either horizontally or vertically on the game board. This will help you progress through the levels efficiently.

Angry Birds

How to play

Press and hold the cursor to control the slingshot.

Pull the slingshot back in the desired direction and to the desired extent to aim the bird towards the pigs. As you adjust the slingshot, a dotted line will appear to indicate the trajectory the bird will follow once released.

Super Mario and Sonic

How to play

Use the Arrow Up key to jump.

Use the Arrow Left and Right keys to move in the corresponding directions.

Be cautious not to fall into pits or collide with turtles as you navigate through the levels. Take your time and plan your moves carefully.

Master Chess

How to play

Click on the chess piece you wish to move.

Then, click on the square where you want to place the selected piece. Remember to follow the standard rules of chess; you cannot move pieces arbitrarily but must adhere to the established rules of the game.

Moto X3M

How to play

Use the Arrow Up key to accelerate and the Arrow Down key to brake.

Use the arrow keys to slide matching tiles together, which will also shift other tiles on the board.

Think ahead and strategize to visualise how the board will appear after each move. This foresight is key to achieving success in the game.

Release the cursor to execute the shot and strike the cue ball.

Keep an eye on the countdown timer and strategize your shots accordingly to maximise your chances of pocketing balls within the time limit.

How to play

Use the Arrow Down key to duck under hindrances on the path.

Keep running to collect coins and power-ups to enhance your performance as you progress.

Control your player's movement using the W key to jump, A key to move backward, and D key to move forward.

Use the Z key to execute a super shot.

Jump by pressing the W key.

Move forward with the D key and backward with the A key to control your player's positioning on the field.

Navigate carefully to dodge obstacles and stay on track as you race through the cyberpunk world.

: Spin the wheel and let fate decide the topic of your quiz. It's a random selection each time. Challenge Mode : Pick the topic you want to tackle and answer all questions without error.

If you fall, use the spacebar strategically to swing back into action. Time your swings carefully to navigate in the right direction and at the correct speed to reach the finish line.

Article Title: Mark Zuckerberg: Facebook CEO shares these pictures of his birthday celebration with Bill Gates as ‘special guest’
Article Text: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg turned 40 on May 14. Like everyone else, the Meta CEO celebrated the day with his friends, family and a ‘special guest’. Sharing a glimpse of the celebrations, Zuckerberg posted pictures of his birthday party on Instagram.In the Instagram post, Zuckerberg reveals how his wife Priscilla recreated a bunch of places he lived in during his early days.These included his childhood bedroom where he learnt coding, Harvard dorm where he launched Facebook, his first apartment with just a mattress on the floor and one of his earlier office spaces.Here’s the link to Mark’s Instagram post with the viral pics:Now what is remarkable about these pictures is that in one of the photos he is seen posing with a ‘special guest’, Microsoft’s former CEO – Bill Gates . Interestingly, both Zuckerberg and Gates dropped out of Harvard to build today’s largest tech companies – Meta (formerly Facebook) and Microsoft , respectively.In another picture, Zuckerberg clicked pictures at a recreated Pinocchio's Pizzeria where he says that he ‘basically lived in college’. In one of the pictures, he can be seen with his daughters showing them the room he grew up in.Sharing another picture, Zuckerberg says that he is grateful that people traveled from all around the world to celebrate his birthday with him.Zuckerberg’s wife Priscilla Chan has also shared an Instagram post wishing him on his birthday. She wrote "Mark doesn't usually let me go big for his birthday, but for his 40th, I was allowed to throw a bash as long as our friends and family also roasted him. We all had a blast! Let’s just say that no one suffered from a lack of material!".
Article Summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg turned 40 on May 14. Like everyone else, the Meta CEO celebrated the day with his friends, family and a ‘special guest’ In one of the photos he is seen posing with Microsoft’s former CEO – Bill Gates. Both Zuckerberg and Gates dropped out of Harvard to build today's largest tech companies.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max: 4 new camera features Apple may add to iPhone 16 Pro models
Article Text:
Upgraded ultra-wide cameras



Tetra-prism lens for iPhone 16 Pro



Improved lens flare control



New Sony primary sensor for improved low-light photography



Apple is expected to launch the iPhone 16 series later this year in September. The upcoming lineup may include four smartphone models -- the iPhone 16, the iPhone 16 Plus, the iPhone 16 Pro and the iPhone 16 Pro Max. The Pro variants in the upcoming iPhone lineup are rumoured to bring new features like larger displays, a dedicated Capture button and more.According to a recent report by 9to5Mac, the Cupertino-based tech giant is also expected to add multiple noticeable improvements to the camera hardware of the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max models. Here are four new camera upgrades that may arrive with iPhone 16 Pro smartphones:Rumours suggest the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max may get an upgraded 48MP Ultra Wide camera this year. This is expected to be a major improvement from the current 12 MP Ultra Wide camera in the iPhone 15 Pro models.This upgrade is expected to offer improved performance in various shooting scenarios, particularly in low-light conditions. Images captured with the new Ultra-Wide camera are likely to show greater details and enhanced colour accuracy. The higher resolution will also provide increased flexibility during editing and post-processing.Furthermore, the 48MP Ultra Wide camera in the iPhone 16 Pro may also lead to significant advancements in spatial video recording. This feature, which utilises both the Main and Ultra Wide lenses, may enable the iPhone 16 Pro to record spatial video in 4K resolution. To compare, the iPhone 15 Pro is limited to recording spatial video at 1080p resolution.The current iPhone 15 Pro Max features a new tetra-prism camera design which offers 5x optical zoom and 25x digital zoom capabilities. With the upcoming iPhone 16 lineup, Apple is reportedly planning to extend this upgraded tetra-prism camera to the smaller iPhone 16 Pro model as well. This means both the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max will offer at least 5x optical zoom and 25x digital zoom.Rumours also suggest that the iPhone 16 Pro Max might feature a “periscope ultra-long telephoto combination.” This technology could potentially enable optical zoom greater than 5x.A common issue faced by most iPhone users is capturing lens flare while shooting in bright lighting conditions. This results in unexpected artefacts and internal reflections showing on images. While this problem is prevalent across most cameras on the market, Apple is reportedly working on a solution for the iPhone 16 Pro.According to rumours, Apple is testing a new "atomic layer deposition" (ALD) lens coating technology for the iPhone 16 Pro models. This anti-reflective coating could be applied to the iPhone 16 Pro's camera lenses to reduce the impact of internal reflections.If this rumour is true, users can expect fewer unexpected artefacts in images captured with the iPhone 16 Pro, particularly in bright lighting scenarios.The iPhone 16 Pro is expected to feature a new main camera sensor from Sony, which is designed to improve low-light performance.As per the report, Sony's latest stacked sensor technology separates the photodiodes and pixel transistors (which are usually combined into a single layer). This separation will allow the photodiodes responsible for capturing light to be significantly larger within the same overall pixel size.Sony claims that this new sensor will capture twice as much light as existing camera sensors. The increased light capture and reduced noise are expected to offer improved photos for iPhone users in all conditions.However, it remains uncertain whether this next-generation Sony sensor will be utilised in both iPhone 16 Pro models. A tipster on the Chinese social media platform Weibo suggested that only the iPhone 16 Pro Max may feature this upgraded stacked camera sensor hardware.
Article Summary: Apple is expected to launch the iPhone 16 series later this year in September. The upcoming lineup may include four smartphone models. The Pro variants in the upcoming iPhone lineup are rumoured to bring new features like larger displays, a dedicated Capture button and more. The Cupertino-based tech giant is also expected to add multiple improvements to the camera hardware.

Article Title: Poco F6 smartphone to launch in India on May 23
Article Text: Poco is all set to launch its latest F-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed that it will launch the Poco F6 smartphone in the country on May 23.The smartphone maker took to X (formerly known as Twitter) to announce the launch of the smartphone. Poco posted an image of the upcoming smartphone on the platform along with a caption which reads, “God level performance for Real Coming your way on 23rd May, 4:30 PM IST only on #Flipkart Know more https://bit.ly/3WF3j3M #POCOF65G #GodModeOn #POCO #POCOIndia.”The upcoming Poco F6 smartphone is said to be powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset.The smartphone is expected to sport a 50MP rear camera.Poco F6 is said to come in golden and black colour options. The smartphone is said to come with a 6.67-inch OLED display with 1.5K screen resolution. Poco F6 is tipped to be backed by a 5000 mAh battery with 120W fast charging support.
Article Summary: Poco is set to launch its latest F-series smartphone in India on May 23. The smartphone maker took to X (formerly known as Twitter) to announce the launch of the smartphone. Poco F6 is said to be powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3.

Article Title: How fake iPhones, AirPods and other Apple products helped this courier service catch employees suspected of stealing from packages
Article Text:
How much these employees stole from UPS customers



How were they caught



US-based multinational shipping and courier service, United Parcel Service ( UPS ) has reportedly used fake iPhones , AirPods, and other Apple products to seize its employees who were allegedly stealing from customers instead of delivering their goods. According to the Palm Beach County Sheriff’s Office (PBSO), four men who were involved in this alleged courier stealing were caught by the police and they are part of a larger criminal conspiracy, reports Bocanewsnow.The defendants, Joseph Nunnally, Payton Brooker and Christopher Ventress have been charged with an organised scheme to defraud.Meanwhile, the fourth defendant, Fouad Saleh has been charged with grand theft, obtaining property by fraud, tampering with physical evidence, and dealing in stolen property. All four arrested UPS employees live in Palm Beach County Florida, US.As per multiple arrest reports filed by PBSO detectives, these men were involved in a scheme to intercept roughly $52,000 worth of iPhones and other Apple products in South Florida.The men allegedly created “ghost labels” while in a UPS facility in Palm Beach County that used addresses flagged by a UPS security system.UPS’ loss prevention system notified the Palm Beach County Sheriff’s Office which then intercepted the already stolen phones. Detectives placed trackers in the boxes which included several fake phones and then watched as the phones (along with the trackers) were delivered to an address in West Palm Beach.The people at the address then took the phones to Boost Mobile. It was unclear whether they then attempted to sell the phones to the retail store or have the phones activated to resell. While they were in Boost Mobile with the tracked phones, PBSO detectives moved in and took everyone into custody.
Article Summary: UPS allegedly used fake iPhones, AirPods, and other Apple products to seize its employees who were allegedly stealing from customers. According to the Palm Beach County Sheriff’s Office, four men who were involved in this alleged courier stealing were caught by the police and they are part of a larger criminal conspiracy.

Initially priced at Rs 1,14,900, the MacBook Air M3 was launched in March 2024 and is currently offered at a reduced rate on the popular e-commerce platform.With a 6 percent discount applied, the price of the MacBook Air M3 is now lowered to Rs 1,07,990. This significant price reduction positions the MacBook Air M3 as an appealing choice for individuals seeking cutting-edge technology coupled with substantial cost savings.The 13-inch MacBook Air M3 variant boasts an 8-core CPU and GPU, along with 8GB of unified memory and 256GB of SSD storage. Article Title: Make money on Instagram through these 10 effective ways; check out now
Article Text:
Make money on Instagram in 2024

Brand partnerships

Earn from Instagram

Open an Instagram shop

Affiliate marketing

Drive traffic to your website

Offer marketing services

Sell creative works

Offer exclusive content

Dropshipping business

Create a feature account

Also read

In today's digital age, Instagram has emerged as a powerhouse social media platform with over one billion active monthly users worldwide. With such a vast and engaged audience, Instagram offers unparalleled opportunities for individuals to leverage their creativity and influence into profitable ventures. Whether you're seeking a supplementary income or aiming to transform Instagram into your primary source of revenue, monetizing your account can be both rewarding and lucrative.Here are 10 effective ways to kickstart your journey towards making money on Instagram.Instagram influencers collaborate with brands to promote products through various content formats such as posts, stories, and live streams. To attract brand partnerships, it's essential to build a substantial following and maintain a high engagement rate with your audience.Instagram incentivizes top creators by offering bonuses when they achieve specific milestones, such as reaching follower targets or achieving high engagement rates on their posts. This program encourages creators to consistently produce engaging content.Use Instagram as a platform to sell products by setting up an online shop. Create a dedicated business account to showcase your products, and leverage features like Instagram Shopping to facilitate seamless transactions directly through the app.Engage in affiliate marketing by partnering with brands to promote their products or services. You don't necessarily need a large following; instead, focus on building connections and leveraging your ability to engage customers and influencers to drive sales.Leverage Instagram to drive traffic to your website if you specialise in SEO or content marketing. Use Instagram stories and posts to share valuable content and promote your website, similar to how influencers endorse brands.If you excel in content creation, copywriting, or caption writing, leverage Instagram as a platform to offer marketing services to brands. Write compelling marketing content and captions for brands' Instagram posts to generate significant revenue.Monetize your creative talents by selling designs, photographs, or videos on Instagram. Showcase your creations to attract potential buyers and earn revenue through sales or commissioned projects.Provide exclusive content, such as courses or insider tips, to your followers for a fee. Exclusive content offerings can ensure a steady revenue stream and enhance your relationship with dedicated followers.Start a dropshipping business on Instagram without owning inventory. Source products from suppliers, set your prices, and engage with customers to facilitate sales. Leverage Instagram's reach to market your products effectively.Establish a niche-specific Instagram page with high engagement and followers. Offer other creators a platform to showcase their work on your page for a fee. For example, create a page dedicated to car and bike photography and charge creators to feature their content.
Article Summary: Instagram incentivizes top creators by offering bonuses when they achieve specific milestones, such as reaching follower targets or achieving high engagement rates on their posts. Use Instagram to drive traffic to your website if you specialise in SEO or content marketing. Establish a niche-specific Instagram page with high engagement and followers.

Article Title: Android 15 rolling out today: How to download, features and more
Article Text:
What's New in

Android 15 Beta 2

?

These might include:

How to download Android 15 Beta 2

Google started rolling out the second beta version of Android 15 today (May 15), offering a glimpse into the upcoming major update for the world's most popular mobile operating system. This beta brings a wave of new features and improvements, along with the chance for early adopters to test and provide feedback.While Google remained tight-lipped about all the specifics at Google I/O 2024, some exciting features hinted at during the keynote are expected to be included in Beta 2.* Enhanced In-App Camera Controls: Granular control over camera settings directly within apps, offering more flexibility for photography enthusiasts.* Partial Screen Sharing: Share specific portions of your screen while keeping other areas private, ideal for presentations or tutorials.* Improved Loudness Equalization: Fine-tune audio levels across different apps, ensuring a consistent listening experience.* Privacy and Security Updates: As always, Google is likely to include further improvements to user privacy and security within the Android system.It's important to remember that Beta software is still under development and may contain bugs or instabilities. If you're a developer or an adventurous user willing to experience potential glitches in exchange for early access to new features, here's how to download:* Eligibility Check: Only certain Google Pixel devices are compatible with the Android 15 Beta program. Visit the official Android Beta website (https://developer.android.com/about/versions/15) to confirm your device's eligibility.* Enrollment Process: If your device qualifies, head over to the Android Beta website and enroll your Pixel in the program.* Software Update: Once enrolled, keep an eye out for a software update notification on your device. Download and install the update following the on-screen instructions.
Article Summary: Google started rolling out the second beta version of Android 15 today (May 15) This beta brings a wave of new features and improvements, along with the chance for early adopters to test and provide feedback. It's important to remember that Beta software is still under development and may contain bugs or instabilities.

Article Title: Smart tips to reduce your summer electricity bill
Article Text:
Reduce electricity bills with smart tips

Purchase electrical appliances with a 5-star BEE rating

Switch to LED Lights

Transition to smart appliances for remote control and enhanced efficiency

Switch to BLDC fans

Utilise solar energy with solar panels

Set AC temperature at 24 degrees Celsius

Enable energy metering with smart Wi-Fi

Regularly servicing and maintaining home appliances to ensure peak performance

Utilise power strips for connecting multiple devices

Turn off electrical appliances when not in use

Alternative sources for reducing home electricity bills

Solar Energy: Solar power is a readily available and environmentally friendly energy source. You can choose solar water heating systems or photovoltaic solar panels. These can be installed on rooftops or in open areas to generate electricity for various household needs.

Wind Energy: Living in windy regions? Consider a small-scale wind turbine as an effective alternative energy source. These turbines harness wind power and convert it into electricity.

Biomass Energy: Biomass energy involves utilising organic materials such as wood pellets, agricultural waste, or animal waste to produce heat or electricity. Biomass stoves or boilers can efficiently provide heating or hot water while reducing reliance on conventional electricity sources.

During summer months, many households experience a significant increase in electricity consumption due to higher cooling needs. While staying comfortable during hot weather is essential, it doesn't have to come at the cost of soaring electricity bills. By implementing strategic energy-saving practices, you can reduce your summer electricity expenses without sacrificing comfort.Here you can explore several effective ways to save on summer electricity bills, offering practical tips and strategies that can help you minimise energy consumption and lower your utility costs during the warmer months.From optimising your cooling system to adopting energy-efficient habits, these recommendations are designed to make a noticeable impact on your electricity expenses while keeping your home cool and comfortable.Let's delve into these actionable tips that can help you save money and energy throughout the summer season.The Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE) issues BEE Star Labels as a voluntary method for manufacturers to indicate an appliance's energy efficiency. The label uses stars to indicate the efficiency of a product, with more stars indicating higher efficiency. Simply put, the higher the energy efficiency rating of the appliance, the lower its energy consumption. To effectively reduce your home's energy costs, opt for appliances with a 5-star BEE rating. Not only does this positively impact the environment, but it also helps lower your electricity bills. Explore Crompton's wide range of 5-star rated ceiling fans to learn more about BEE Rating Appliances.If your home still uses CFLs and incandescent bulbs, it's time to replace them with LED bulbs. LED bulbs are not just a trendy choice; they are recognized for their energy efficiency and superior illumination. If you're wondering how to reduce your electricity bill at home, switching to LED bulbs is the solution for you.Upgrading to smart appliances is a highly effective method to decrease electricity consumption at home. These devices allow you to automate tasks and manage energy usage efficiently. Consider installing energy-efficient ceiling fans to further reduce electricity consumption. Smart appliances typically come equipped with remote control capabilities, allowing you to schedule operations and conserve power. Crompton offers remote-controlled fans designed for enhanced energy savings and lower power consumption.These energy-efficient fans are gaining popularity due to their brushless direct current motors (BLDC), which operate on direct current electricity. They can help save up to 60% on electricity compared to normal induction motor-based fans. Additionally, they offer convenient features like remote control for turning the fan on and off, timer functionality, and compatibility with voice assistants. To learn more about the differences between BLDC fans and normal fans and how they can help reduce electricity bills, explore further information on BLDC fans versus conventional fans.Implementing a full solar power system for your home can be a substantial investment. However, there are more accessible and cost-effective ways to leverage solar energy. Installing outdoor solar lights in your balcony and garden, along with solar fans, can notably reduce your energy expenses at a modest cost. Additionally, using solar pumps for daily tasks can contribute to electricity savings. It's beneficial to understand the distinction between an electric geyser and a solar geyser to make an informed choice for your energy needs.Maintain your air conditioner at 24 degrees Celsius to optimise cooling and conserve energy during the summer months, effectively lowering electricity costs. Additionally, using a timer to automate AC operation and upgrading to a 5-star BEE-rated model can further enhance energy efficiency and reduce expenses associated with cooling your space.Numerous advanced smart energy metres are currently offered in the market. These metres typically use Wi-Fi connectivity to monitor overall power usage within a home and provide real-time analysis of consumption patterns. Additionally, they can detect power leaks and identify high-energy-consuming appliances. Wi-Fi LED bulbs represent an excellent choice for reducing electricity usage.Regularly servicing and maintaining your home appliances is essential for optimal functionality and efficiency. Appliances that are not properly maintained are known to consume excessive energy, so routine maintenance can prolong their lifespan and reduce energy consumption. Learn more about the importance of cleaning exhaust fans.Install a power strip if you have several electronic devices or appliances that need to be plugged into a single electrical outlet. This allows you to easily turn off all devices at once when they are not in use, preventing unnecessary energy consumption often referred to as "phantom" energy loss.One of the simplest and most effective methods to lower electricity costs is by turning off electrical devices such as lights, fans, and air conditioners when they are not in use.
